text: The 1983 Navy Midshipmen football team represented the United States Naval Academy (USNA) during the 1983 NCAA Division I-A football season. Navy competed as an independent with no conference affiliation. The team was led by second-year head coach Gary Tranquill. ==Schedule== ==Roster== ==Game summaries== ===Pittsburgh=== *Napoleon McCallum 172 Rush Yds ===Army=== ==References== Navy Midshipmen Category:Navy Midshipmen football seasons Category:1983 in sports in Maryland
title: 1983 Navy Midshipmen football team
